mapper.select: SELECT o.*, t.table_name FROM orders o JOIN customer_sessions cs ON o.session_id = cs.customer_sessions_id JOIN tables t ON cs.table_id = t.table_id WHERE o.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY o.ordered_at ASC
SELECT DISTINCT o.* FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.shop_id = #{shopId} AND oi.status = #{status} ORDER BY o.ordered_at ASC

SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.order_id, oi.menu_item_id, oi.quantity, oi.ordered_at, oi.is_canceled, oi.nickname, oi.color_code, oi.status, oi.completed_by, oi.served_by, oi.completed_at, oi.served_at, mi.item_category, mc.is_food FROM order_items oi JOIN menu_items mi ON oi.menu_item_id = mi.menu_item_id JOIN menu_categories mc ON mi.item_category = mc.category_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
